name: 职场浮生记 Chinese Office
description:
Get a job! If you aren’t the chosen one!


You just can’t have a perfect opening for sure, but you can design your character all by yourself! You can be handsome one to get advantage on social, be a smart one to finish your job like a piece of cake, or make the game character just like yourself? Like in the real world, all this decision will impact when your start working!

Never mind of coding if you don’t know a bit of it


As all of us start our career as a programmer, so you will be a software engineer in our game too!(Why not?) You can change your career for sure or even make a promote to be a manager! Start your own business? Just do it! Don’t ask us why we start your career as a programmer, everyone can be a programmer this day, isn’t it!

You can get Cards everywhere! But to be noticed, we are not RogueLike


We all fans of Taiko Risshiden by our hearts, after struggling(It doesn’t take a long time, So don’t worry.) We decide to make cards for all skills and characters. But, still, it isn’t a Roguelike game. And if you want to get the card, you should meet the right one!

Work, Work, Work, Work, You can keep work, work, work…


Keep a balance between work and your personal life! Enjoy your daily life In the city of XiaZhou! Stay at home to feed your cat? Build your cooking skill? Or play some video game? You decide it! Besides, you can also go out and get some extra job if you nedd more money! Or even find the true love in this city..

Go back to your office and keep working? Okay! Don’t do that if you heard me! But if you insist, please suit yourself.

Enjoy your life!


Like in China, We have pliantly of characters in this game. Hang out with your college, have a date with someone you meet, fall in love with someone somewhere or even get marriage or even have a child… Yeah… I know, like the real life. But I promise, whatever you do, it worth it and it’s your story.

Welcome to Chinese Office, Have a Great Job!
